Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix [object Object] error in editorial board submit

The API returns errors as { error: { code, message } } but the frontend
was alerting error.error directly \(an object\). Now correctly extracts
the message string from errorData.error?.message with fallbacks.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add create series from existing book functionality

- Add standalone projects section to Series Management page
- Ability to convert standalone books to series with auto-populated details
- New API endpoint POST /api/trilogy/projects/:id/create-series
- New API endpoint DELETE /api/trilogy/books/:id to remove books from series
- Book genre and title auto-populate when converting to series
- Book becomes Book 1 of the new series

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Backfill version 1 for all legacy books without versions

Adds migration 043 that automatically creates version 1 for all books
that don''t have any versions, and updates chapters/chapter_edits to
reference the new version. This fixes the "Too many requests" error
when using the version migration button.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
